name: My Ice Cream Truck - Make Sweet Frozen Desserts
name_original: My Ice Cream Truck - Make Sweet Frozen Desserts
description:
Your love for ice cream is so big that you feel like sharing it with everyone around?
Well, with My Ice Cream Truck, now you can!

Drive your ice cream truck through the sweetest neighborhoods offering more than just refreshing treats, but sugary happiness in cones! The first tools and ingredients available for you to work with might not seem enough for the fastidious ice cream lover inside you. But that is exactly what will motivate you to do the best job possible: unlock new ingredients and recipes by serving your customers their precise orders!

Life is not only made of ice cream (we wish!) so you may get some customers ordering milkshakes or slushies, but nothing far from a proper ice cream master menu!

As if ice cream is not good enough to make you popular in the neighbourhood, the yumminess of your service will draw the attention of the local newspaper to say some zestful words about your work. The true joy of work!

FEATURES
• Fun and tasteful ice cream flavors like Berry Blue (blueberry), Chocoholic (chocolate), Kiwi Sea (kiwi), Autumn Delight (mango), Very Berry (strawberry) and Vanilla Zilla (vanilla)
• Delicious toppings like whipped cream, choco chips, chopped nuts, colorful sprinkles and wafer rolls
• Buy ice and start selling appetizing slushies
• Equip your truck with a mixer to start making milkshakes
• Happy customers will always come back!

What a joyful sound when the Ice Cream truck is approaching! Download My Ice Cream Shop now and start this frozen and delicious adventure!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
